name: Bail-Out
description:
What do you do if your bank gets a load of money from the government to save you from bankruptcy and economic disaster? You get yourself a nice, juicy bonus, of course! But alas, the moral police, several law-makers and public opinion seems to think you shouldn't benefit personally from running a bank into the ground. Can you make your way to the safe and load your exclusive sports car with sacks of bail-out money while avoiding the long arm of the law?

* Classic LCD gameplay
* Simple, intuitive controls
* Two game modes
* Real LCD screen pressing bloom effect!
* Realistic LCD graphics
* Photocopied instruction manual
* Global leaderboards
* Facebook integration, boast about your score to your friends!

* * * * * * * * * *

"Bail-Out [...] is the perfect replica of the Game and Watch games in terms of realism and gameplay. 4 out of 5"
- pocketfullofapps.com

"...impressively detailed recreation of old LCD games. 7/10"
- brickroll.com

* * * * * * * * * *

BailOut, like all Score Studios games, is updated and supported continuously. If you have any suggestions, requests or comments let us know by emailing us as info@score-studios.jp!
